test.christmasGreetings1: We wish you a merry christmas

refreng.1: Shine a light in the twilight hour
refreng.2: when all sounds are muffled by falling snow.
refreng.3: Shine a light in the twilight hour
refreng.4: and let it shine until evening says good night.

vers1.3: this morning as I lay on my pillow dreaming.
vers1.4: We put scarf and mittens on
vers1.6: soon leaving children’s footprints on the snowy ground.

vers2.2: all the way to the top,
vers2.3: then we rushed down again - far into the field.
vers2.6: laughing and sliding down again, children of every age.

vers3.3: with princes and a snow queen - so beautiful indeed.
vers3.5: We must go home, evening is here,
vers3.6: the darkening sky tells us so.

hilsen.takker: ***** English Text ***** Computas ønsker å takke for et spennende og fremgangsrikt år i 2014, og ser frem til fortsatt samarbeide i 2015.
hilsen.donasjon: Tradisjonen tro har vi valgt å støtte en god sak med en donasjon, denne gang til aksjonen NerdAid 3 og Røde Kors til arbeidet på Filipinene etter tyfonens herjinger.
